text: It's time to explore the dashboards and risk insights that give management complete visibility into grievance trends.
The dashboard provides a real-time view of total complaints, open cases, those in-process, overdue cases, and resolve issues.
This helps management quickly assess the overall situation.
Complaints are automatically grouped into categories like wages and benefits, harassment,
discrimination, health and safety, working hours and ethical business.
This allows factories to identify recurring issues and plan targeted interventions, you
can also view insights by unit, department or shift.
This makes it easier to pinpoint hotspots.
The system also tracks RCA and CAPA performance, showing how quickly issues were resolved,
the quality of the investigation, and whether similar complaints are recurring.
Timeline monitoring highlights average investigation times and overdue cases.
This helps leadership ensure that grievances are being addressed within the required timeframes.
Workers' satisfaction indicators show how employees responded during verification calls.
This gives management a clear picture of whether solutions are genuinely helping workers.
You can also analyze trends over weeks, months, or years to support strategic decision-making
and internal planning. And finally, all reports are exportable for HRDD, ESG and CSDD compliance, making it easy
to prepare due diligence reports, share updates with brands and complete social audits.
Together, these dashboards turn grievance data into actionable insights and help build a transparent, responsible, and compliant workplace.
